^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AdditionalDataSizeBytes.description: The size of diagnostic data in bytes for the log entry if the entry type is `DUMP`.
AdditionalDataSizeBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the size of diagnostic data in bytes for the log entry if the entry if the entry type is `DUMP`.

AdditionalDataURI.description: The offload URI of the diagnostic data if the entry type is `DUMP`.
AdditionalDataURI.longDescription: This property shall contain the offload URI of the diagnostic data if the entry type is `DUMP`.

DiagnosticDataType.description: The type of diagnostic data entry
DiagnosticDataType.longDescription: This property shall contain the type of diagnostic data entry.

OEMDiagnosticDataType.description: The OEM type of diagnostic data entry
OEMDiagnosticDataType.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM type of diagnostic data entry.
